concept.title: PGI 247.370 DD Form 1384, Transportation Control and Movement.

conbody.p: DTR 4500.9-R, Defense Transportation Regulation, Part II, Chapter 203 is available at http://www.transcom.mil/dtr/part-ii/dtr_part_ii_203.pdf.
